title: [Large-Scale] Mobile Microlearning Design Based on a Recommendation System

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Requirement for 10-minute modular content to support workplace-integrated learning for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can curate job-relevant science content with 80% accuracy using recommendation systems
Learners can complete customized microlearning courses within 24 hours based on reusable learning design templates
Learners can improve the applicability of recommended learning activities by 75% or more through formative assessment

resources: Science Domain Standard Learning Design Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
